au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: 10T_pol_sf1_L1=L2=16m_central_flux_proposal888
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: import time # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5.76) sics.set('/instrument/detector/detector_y/speed', 53) driveDet(15250,0) # Drive guide to p1 config driveGuide(guideConfig.p1) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for p1) driveFlipper(1) time.sleep(210) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 7.5 mm sics.drive('apx', -47) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1) sics.set('beamcenterx', 95.8285) sics.set('beamcenterz', 92.8861) sics.execute('OxfordSetRate 0.1') sics.execute('OxfordSetfield 10.0') sics.execute('broadcast ready') #time.sleep(210) sics.execute('broadcast ready')
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(22, 100) # Drive attenuator to 210 driveAtt(210)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(22, 0) driveBsz(242.0)
